titleStmt.title: The last speech of Sir Godfrey McCullough of Myretoun, knight and baronet, who was beheaded at the cross of Edinburgh, the twenty sixth day of March, 1697.
titleStmt.author: McCullough, Godfrey, Sir.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Reid, and are to be sold at his printing house in Bells Wynd,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
